skipped: The follaein reference(s) couldna be filled:
responsibility: Ye are responsible for every eedit ye mak.
pleasedoublecheck: Please dooble-check the eedit afore savin!
noaccessdate: Note: Dates o access are omittit in the result. Please verify whether the references still support the statements, an add the dates whaur appropriate.
chancetoreview: Ye will have a chance tae review the eedit afore it's saved.
unfinished: Due tae leemits, the program couldna fix aw references. Try savin an runnin the tuil again.
option-plainlink: Uise plain formattin instead o {{cite web}}
option-plainlink-description: If selectit, bare references will be expandit wioot uisin {{cite web}}. This is discooraged syne cite templates provide a consistent citation style an enable easy parsin bi programmes.
option-noremovetag-description: If selectit, airtin rot tags will be kept even if nae reference is skipped unexpectitly during the process.
option-nowatch: Dinna watch the page when uisin Wiki as the soorce
option-nowatch-description: If selectit, the 'Watch this page' checkbox on the on-wiki eeditin interface will be unticked bi default.
option-addblankmetadata: Add blank metadata fields when the information is unavailable
option-noaccessdate-description: If selectit, dates o access will be omittit in the result.
option-usedomainaswork: Uise the base domain name as wirk when this information canna be parsed
wmflabs-thankyoutest: Thank ye for testin the experimental version o $1. Please report the bugs ye encoonter.
wmflabs-testsummary: Filled in $1 bare reference(s) wi the test version o $3
